name: Expert Criminal Killer 3D
description:
Expert Criminal Killer 3D is a thrilling action FPS Mountain Sniper Game. Hold your breath, lock the enemy, aim, You will double the gold reward from head shot.
Once you enter the target location, There is no turning back, so you need to be very careful, fast,accurate, ruthless onslaught.
This game has realistic sound effect, amazing game graphics and easy controls.
